content.question: A student swings a ball on a light rod at a constant speed in a vertical circle, as shown in the figure. Which of the following correctly ranks the magnitudes of the forces exerted by the rod on the ball <math alttext="F sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="F sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, <math alttext="F sub 3" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>, and <math alttext="F sub 4" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math> when the ball is at locations 1, 2, 3, and 4, respectively?

choices.label: <math alttext="F sub 1 equals F sub 2, which equals F sub 3, which equals F sub 4" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>4</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="open parenthesis, F sub 2 equals F sub 3, close parenthesis, is greater than F sub 4, which is greater than F sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

<math alttext="F sub 4 is greater than F sub 1, which is greater than, open parenthesis, F sub 2 equals F sub 3, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>

<math alttext="F sub 1 is greater than F sub 4, which is greater than, open parenthesis, F sub 2 equals F sub 3, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>></mo><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="open parenthesis, F sub 2 equals F sub 3, close parenthesis, is greater than F sub 4, which is greater than F sub 1" overflow="scroll"><mo stretchy="false">(</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy="false">)</mo><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mo>></mo><msub><mi>F</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math>

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
